solution_line_template: A total of {packets_per_week} x {grams_per_packet} = <<{packets_per_week}*{grams_per_packet}={total_grams_per_week}>>{total_grams_per_week} grams are sold every week.

Since 1 kilogram is equal to {grams_per_kilogram} grams, then {total_grams_per_week}/{grams_per_kilogram} = <<{total_grams_per_week}/{grams_per_kilogram}={total_kilograms_per_week}>>{total_kilograms_per_week} kilograms of sugar are sold every week.
